data.name: BITGUN: Prelude
data.detailed_description:
BITGUN: Prelude is an action roguelite zombie shooter with difficult and satisfying combat you can learn and master. Guns break quickly and you lose all your gear when you die.

Set in the BITGUN universe, in BITGUN: Prelude you get to find out what happened before the outbreak. Play as one of four unique characters, each with their own playstyle, as you blast your way through hordes of zombies in search of answers. Along the way you'll find powerful weapons and gear to help you survive, but don't get too comfortable, because it won't last long.

Features:

- Intense zombie shooter action
- Learn and master the combat
- Guns break quickly and you lose all your gear when you die
- Procedurally generated levels for a different experience every time

Explore the unfolding of a zombie apocalypse and watch the civilization fall. Friends turn against each other, and people will do whatever it takes to survive. What would you do in their shoes?

Gameplay:

- Top down shooter with very polished combat.
- Huge hordes of zombies in procedurally generated levels.
- Chaotic combat between humans and zombies where everyone is in for themselves.

This is not an easy game. Enemies in BITGUN: Prelude are relentless and unforgiving. If you make a mistake, you will die, and you will lose all your gear. There are no second chances. You must be prepared for a challenge, and you must be willing to learn from your mistakes.

BITGUN: Prelude is the prelude to the BITGUN universe. This is a universe where the undead are not the only threat, and where civilization has already fallen. In this universe, there is only one rule: survive at all costs.

data.short_description: BITGUN Prelude is an intense zombie shooter that will test your skills to the limit. With guns that break quickly and no gear to help you when you die, you'll need to be on your toes if you want to survive. Can you make it through the hordes of zombies and make it to safety?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
